entries.title: LIVE NOW: SpaceX’s Dragon Cargo Ship Undocks From the ISS
entries.description: The Spacelab Module housed in the cargo bay of the shuttle Columbia during the STS-83 mission, April 1997. The shuttle is in orbit over the Bahamas. The emblem on the left commemorates the various countries which participated in the mission, and the pentagon on the right is the logo of NASA's Microgravity Science Laboratory 1 mission (MSL-1). (Photo by Space Frontiers/Getty Images)

entries.title: LIVE NOW: State Department Briefing With Ned Price
entries.description: US State Department spokesman Ned Price speaks on the situation in Afghanistan at the State Department in Washington, DC, on August 18, 2021. - The US is pressing the Taliban to let Afghans flee through the US-controlled airport after violations of their promises, Sherman said Wednesday. "We have seen reports that the Taliban, contrary to their public statements and their commitments to our government, are blocking Afghans who wish to leave the country from reaching the airport," Sherman told reporters. (Photo by Andrew Harnik / POOL / AFP) (Photo by ANDREW HARNIK/POOL/AFP via Getty Images)

(Stephane Nitschke/Reuters)
